sectionDesc: Structured educational experiences and guided tours designed for learning, adventure, and conservation
whyTitle: Why Choose Al Dosari Reserve for Group Visits?
whyList: Guided by certified educators and naturalists
Age-appropriate programs for all educational levels
Hands-on learning experiences in natural settings
Support materials and pre-visit resources provided
safetyDesc: All group visits include trained staff, first-aid facilities, emergency plans, and appropriate safety equipment for activities.
imageAlt: Students enjoying educational trip at Al Dosari Reserve
